pages.title: Monstrous Helm
pages.text: $(li)The Monstrous Helm can be worn on your head.$(br)$(li)When equipped, if you fall below half of your life, you will pushing nearby monster and gain multiple buffs like Resisance, Knockback Resistance and Regeneration.

pages.name: Monstous Helm
pages.text: It can only be created in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smithing_table)Smithing Table$(/l).
